sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <v-main>
      <v-container fluid>
        <!-- Only show the navbar and footer on specific routes -->
        <template v-if="!isAuthPage">
          <NavbarComponent />
        </template>

        <!-- Main content area -->
        <router-view></router-view>

        <template v-if="!isAuthPage">
          <FooterComponent />
        </template>
      </v-container>
    </v-main>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import { computed } from 'vue';
import { useRoute } from 'vue-router';
import NavbarComponent from './components/Navbar.vue';
import FooterComponent from './components/FooterComponent.vue';

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    NavbarComponent,
    FooterComponent,
  },
  setup() {
    const route = useRoute();
    const isAuthPage = computed(() =>
      ['/login', '/signup'].includes(route.path)
    );

    return {
      isAuthPage,
    };
  },
};
</script>

<style></style>
